params.text: Emikwano
Erinnya lyange nze Simo.
Nina emikwano ena.

params.alt: Amagama abo nguZizo, Lele, Sisa kanye no-Ayanda.
params.title: Amagama abo nguZizo, Lele, Sisa kanye no-Ayanda.

params.text: Amannya gaabwe ge ga, Zizo, Lele, Sisa ne Ayanda.

params.alt: Umngani wami uZizo uthanda ukudlala ibhola.
params.title: Umngani wami uZizo uthanda ukudlala ibhola.

params.text: Mukwano gwange Zizo ayagala okuzannya omupiira.
Mukwano gwange Lele ayagala okuwuga.

params.alt: Umngane wami uSisa uthanda ukudlala umacashelana.
params.title: Umngane wami uSisa uthanda ukudlala umacashelana.

params.text: Mukwano gwange Sisa ayagala okuzannya jjangu onkwekule.
Mukwano gwange Ayanda ayagala okusoma.

params.alt: Mina? Ngiyathanda ukwenza izinto abathanda ukuzenza.
params.title: Mina? Ngiyathanda ukwenza izinto abathanda ukuzenza.

params.text: Nze? Njagala okukola ebintu bye baagala okukola.
Nzannya omupiira ne Zizo.
Mpuga ne Lele.
Nzannya jjangu onkwekule ne Sisa.
Nsoma ne Ayanda.
Jangu, mukwano, oyagala ki?
Jangu, tuzannye omupiira.
Jangu, tuwuge.
Jangu, tuzanye jangu onkwekule.
Jangu, tusome.
Twagala tunyumirwe n’emikwano.

"Emikwano" credits

This work, "Emikwano", is a derivative of "Friends" by Zimbili Dlamini and Hlengiwe Zondi, used under CC BY. "Abangani" is licensed under CC BY 4.0 by Curious Learning.


Book builder - Abraham Jerry Kakooza
